title: Classified
description: COMING SOON!Wanted: Young man between the ages of 21 and 30 to pose as a boyfriend for an undetermined amount of time. Please call 555-7342 if interested. Pay negotiable.Amy has been in love with Charlie since childhood, but he considers her more of a sister than a love interest. After walking in on Charlie and his latest conquest in a compromising situation Amy decides she needs to make Charlie jealous. She hires Gabriel, an out of work actor, to pose as her boyfriend. Unfortunately Charlie has a secret not even Amy knows, a secret that Gabriel accidentally discovers, a secret that means he could never admit his feelings for her.
author: Jennifer Szewczuk
